support.title: Welcome to Da' Hood
support.descp:
Greetings from author Henry Chang and director Patrick Chen as they welcome you to the project.
You will be given access to behind-the-scenes, photos stills and update status of the film.
Plus acknowledgement on Detective Jack Yu's Facebook Page.
INCLUDES:
Special Gratitude on Det. Jack Yu Facebook Page
Thank you message

support.title: From NYC Chinatown to You
support.descp:
💌 Get a LIMITED print postcard signed by author Henry Chang sent to your mailbox.
PLUS your choice of 1 of 2 Director Patrick Chen's Award Winning Chinatown stories!
You will be given a password protected link to
• The Last Tip
• Confucius Plaza
INCLUDES:
Limited Print Postcard
Access to 1 of 2 films, "The Last Tip" or "Confucius Plaza"
Special Gratitude on Det. Jack Yu Facebook Page
Thank you message

support.title: Variant Film Poster by Jerry Ma
support.descp:
Ltd. 'SIGNED' 24"x36" poster print of "A Father's Son" illustrated by Taiwanese American Artist Jerry Ma.
*Ma's is known as one of the founding members of the ground breaking graphic novel Secret Identities: The Asian American Superhero Anthology. His list of works include VIBE Magazine, The Jeremy Lin Foundation, Hyphen Magazine, The New York Asian Film Festival, GAP Kids, Aeropostale, Champion, and he has spoken at events including The Smithsonian Museum, ECAASU, The Metropolitan Museum of Art and many others.
+with additional perks listed below.
INCLUDES:
24"x36" Movie Poster
Digital Private Screener
Film Credit
Special Gratitude on Det. Jack Yu Facebook Page
Thank you message

support.title: Lucky
support.descp:
Become a Dai Lo like the character Lucky Tat from the book as our Co-Executive Producer.
Not only are you supporting our film, but the Asian American entertainment as well. You will receive acknowledgement in the film + IMDb.
Both Henry Chang & Patrick Chen with celebrity special guest(s) will take you out to a private dinner in Manhattan's Chinatown. Plus 2x tickets to a film festival of our screening. When and where (TBA) after submissions.
*Transportation and lodging not included.
INCLUDES:
Co-Executive Producer credit
Dinner with the Cast and Crew
2x Film Festival Tickets
1yr MOCA membership
Digital Private Screener
Complete signed copies of book no. 1-5
Bookmarks
Limited Print Postcard
Jack Yu's Tee-Shirt
24"x36" Movie Poster
Love Express DVD+CD
MOCA Tote Bag
Access viewing to both "The Last Tip" & "Confucius Plaza"
Special Gratitude on Det. Jack Yu Facebook Page
Thank you message

support.title: Advance Screening @MOCANYC
support.descp:
Join the community to an advance screening of our film in Chinatown's MOCA (Museum of Chinese in America) for a chance to meet the filmmakers.
*Travel and accommodation not included.
INCLUDES:
1x admission to an advance screening at MOCA
Film Credit
Limited Print Postcard
Access to 1 of 2 films, "The Last Tip" or "Confucius Plaza"
Special Gratitude on Det. Jack Yu Facebook Page
Thank you message

support.title: Legendary Print from Corky Lee 📷
support.descp:
Receive a signed print from photojournalist Corky Lee. Each photo is sealed in a black matte board to protect this piece of history.
Choose ONE of the following:
• Sojourner Mailboxes '76
• Golden Spike 145th Anniversary Reenactment '14
• Golden Spike 150th Anniversary Descendants & Veterans '19
*Lee's work has documented key events in Asian American political history starting in the early '70s.
+with additional perks listed below.
INCLUDES:
Signed Photo Print on Matte Board
Digital Private Screener
Film Credit
Limited Print Postcard
Special Gratitude on Det. Jack Yu Facebook Page
Thank you message

support.title: Dim Sum 點心
support.descp:
Join author Henry Chang and director Patrick Chen as they take you to one of their favorite Dim Sum spot in Manhattan's Chinatown. A chance to talk, mingle and to show their appreciation by picking up the check.
"...And no check fights will be necessary"
Guest will receive a personal signed book from author Henry Chang 📖
*Transportation and lodging not included.
INCLUDES:
Brunch with Author and Filmmaker
Digital Private Screener
Film Credit
Signed Paperback copy of Book no. 5 "Lucky"
Bookmarks
Limited Print Postcard
Love Express DVD+CD
Access to 1 of 2 films, "The Last Tip" or "Confucius Plaza"
Special Gratitude on Det. Jack Yu Facebook Page
Thank you message

support.title: 🍜🍲 with a Warrior
support.descp:
Lunch with PERRY YUNG (Warrior, Boogie, The Knick, Royal Pains) and director Patrick Chen at Manhattan's Chinatown. A chance to talk on acting or about representations in movies/shows, including🔪 #WarriorMax
"...And no check fights will be necessary"
Guest will receive a signed paperback from author Henry Chang 📕
*Transportation and lodging not included.
INCLUDES:
Lunch with Actor and Filmmaker
Digital Private Screener
Film Credit

Bookmarks

support.title: The Tourist🏮
support.descp:
Be part of our AMAZING team and get an Associate Producer credit both on the film + IMDb.
Plus a chance to join us at our wrap party to meet the team, the filmmakers and the community at our local hangout spot in NYC Chinatown.
+INCLUDES: 1 year membership with MOCA (Museum of Chinese in America) + autograph paperback copy with additional perks listed below.
INCLUDES:
Associate Producer credit
1yr MOCA membership
Wrap Party Celebration
Digital Private Screener
Your choice of 1x 'signed' Paperback copy
